availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lewis M. Horn (Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Patsy Horn. Father of Sarah E. Horn, Emily F. Horn, Susan J. Horn, Morrow Horn, Thomas M. Horn, Nannie Horn, and Newton H. Horn. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Simpson County in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 16A.
